WorkItem.Summary: cannot get any value when the excel5 file contain a line

Comments.Message: There appears to be an embedded object of some kind layered over cell B1, but I can't identify what that object is. However, cell B1 itself contains nothing. This is exactly what I'd expect to see in this case. What is the embedded object?

I am not so sure what the embedded object is. It is the excel from the client. After second check there is nothing in the cell B1, it is just the floating embedded object over it. Is there any way i can remove this before reading the xls?
